Header.title: WellSpring
Header.paragraph: Are you far away? Got busy schedules? Do you need to speak with a therapist? We've got you covered!

paragraph: WellSpring is a new entry in the medical industry here in Nigeria with the hopes of eradicating the factors responsible for the increment in suicidal rates across the globe.
Our primary objective is to ensure an all-round well-being in alignment with the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) by putting preventive measures for mental health in place.
We are a free digital healthcare service provider that focuses on serving as a safe haven for all individuals within and beyond our community through confidential online therapy sessions.
Our platform gives you the opportunity to connect with medical experts that are eager to diagnose and care for you all through these phases.
Our organization boost of highly certified professionals, from psychologists to mental health practitioners, nurses, medical doctors to pharmacists and social workers.
Why: Well structured measures to reduce suicidal rates across the world.
Opportunity to safe time and cost while you heal at your own pace.
You'll have the privilege to speak with competent and confidential professionals.
We are the trusted solution providing app and website for mental health counselling.
Why2: We help curb emotional triggers that leads to Mental Health Issues.
Our conservational mode of delivery helps our clients embrace openness.
Opportunity to track your progress through your healing journey.
We create a balance between the physical and psychological lifestyle of our clients.

Features.text: A healthy body houses a happy mind.

Features.name: Chat Session
Features.text: Connect with both professionals and other clients across the world.
